title: Tracy Brabin – 2021 Comments on Buses in West Yorkshire
author: admin
summary: The comments made on Twitter by Tracy Brabin, the Mayor of West Yorkshire, on 11 May 2021.
content: Second day in job as West Yorkshire Mayor and heading to work on the bus. Timetable online doesn’t match actual arrival/journey times, no information at bus stops (bus number would help). 15 min drive 1hr+ on the bus. We must be able to do better than this. @arrivayorkshire
